name: elementsEqual(_:by:)
desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this sequence and another sequence contain equivalent elements in the same order, using the given predicate as the equivalence test.
declaration: func elementsEqual<OtherSequence>(_ other: OtherSequence, by areEquivalent: (Element, OtherSequence.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows -> Bool where OtherSequence : Sequence
